about_the_game:
Game Overview:

Get ready to take control of the most unique dance party ever with Meowingtons and pals! In this ragdoll dancing simulator, you’ll use intuitive controls to move Meowingtons to the beat of the music. Create hilariously chaotic dance routines, time your moves with the rhythm, and make that goofy cat bounce around.

Key Features:

  • Ragdoll Dance Mechanics: Control meowingtons head or his butt independently using a simple UI to create ragdoll dance moves synced to the beat. The more creative you get, the funnier it becomes! Feel free to break it.

  • Meet Meowingtons & Friends: Play as the main character Meowingtons, or switch it up with a variety of other cats. Bring your own style to the dancefloor and interact with some NPC's to get all the latest gossip and drama.

  • Diverse Dance Floors: Groove your way through Oberhasli Nightclub, and explore new areas! Every location offers a new backdrop for your wild dance routines.

  • Multiplayer: Host a lobby and let up to 7 of your friends join the party, includes text chat and proximity voice chat!

  • Achievements: We've worked particularity hard to include the most random and absurd achievements to this game... if you can find 'em all.

name: Meowingtons Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This isn’t your typical dance game...Explore club Oberhasli and Control meowingtons' movements, every dance is an opportunity to create something unique, funny, or downright absurd. Whether you’re bouncing around on the decks, or find a better place to throw down, there’s no wrong way to dance. neat
